text: En helt ny jul is a Christmas album by Amy Diamond, and her first album in Swedish. It was released in 2008 on the Bonnier Amigo Music Group label. It consists of both older and newer Christmas songs. ==Track listing== {| class="wikitable" |- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" !align="left"| Nr. !align="center"| Title !align="center"| Music !align="center"| Lyrics !align="center"| Length |- |align="left"|1 |align="left"|Nu tändas tusen juleljus "(instrumental- intro)" |align="center" colspan="2"|Emmy Köhler |align="center"|0:30 |- |align="left"|2 |align="left"|När vi närmar oss jul |align="center"| |align="center"| |align="center"|4:21 |- |align="left"|3 |align="left"|En helt ny jul |align="center"| |align="center"| |align="center"|4:16 |- |align="left"|4 |align="left"|Hej, mitt vinterland |align="center" colspan="2"|Britt Lindeborg |align="center"|2:18 |- |align="left"|5 |align="left"|Mer jul |align="center" colspan="2"|Adolphson-Falk |align="center"|3:36 |- |align="left"|6 |align="left"|När julen rullar över världen |align="center"| |align="center"| |align="center"|4:02 |- |align="left"|7 |align="left"|Jul, jul, strålande jul |align="center"|Gustaf Nordqvist |align="center"|Edvard Evers |align="center"|2:40 |- |align="left"|8 |align="left"|Tänd ett ljus |align="center" colspan="2"|Niklas Strömstedt och Lasse Lindbom |align="center"|4:38 |- |align="left"|9 |align="left"|Kom håll min hand |align="center"|Pelle Ekerstam |align="center"|Pelle Ekerstam |align="center"|3:51 |- |align="left"|10 |align="left"|Viskar en bön |align="center"| |align="center"| |align="center"|3:16 |- |align="left"|11 |align="left"|Betlehems stjärna ("Gläns över sjö och strand") |align="center"|Alice Tegnér |align="center"|Viktor Rydberg |align="center"|4:53 |- |align="left"|12 |align="left"|Julen är här |align="center" colspan="2"|Billy Butt and Sölve Rydell |align="center"|3:17 |- |align="left"|13 |align="left"|Nu tändas tusen juleljus "(instrumental- outro)" |align="center" colspan="2"|Emmy Köhler |align="center"|0:47 |- |} ==Contributors== *Amy Diamond -
